title: Terms of Use
introduction: These Terms of Use ('Terms') govern your use of the CrossSend application ('the App') provided by CrossSend Team ('we', 'us', or 'our'). By downloading, installing, or using the App, you agree to these Terms.

sections.title: License
sections.content: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable license to use the App for your personal, non-commercial purposes, subject to these Terms.

sections.title: User Responsibilities
sections.content: You are responsible for all activity that occurs under your use of the App and for any content you transmit using the App. You agree not to use the App for any illegal purposes or to transmit any illegal, harmful, threatening, defamatory, or otherwise objectionable material.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.content: The App and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of CrossSend Team. The App is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws.

sections.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
sections.content: The App is provided 'as is' and 'as available' without any warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not warrant that the App will be uninterrupted or error-free.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
sections.content: In no event shall we be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your access to or use of or inability to access or use the App.

sections.title: Changes to Terms
sections.content: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect.

sections.title: Governing Law
sections.content: These Terms shall be governed by the laws of the jurisdiction in which the company is incorporated, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at support@crosssend.app
